title: Set custom site slug to AryaTatainsurance

requirements.text: Configure the site’s custom domain/slug name as "AryaTatainsurance" (replacing the previously invalid "Arya@Tata-Insurance") and ensure the generated shareable site URL uses this slug without validation errors.
acceptanceCriteria: The slug passes the platform validation rules (5–50 characters; only letters, numbers, and hyphens).
After applying the slug, the site can be opened via the platform’s shareable URL using the new slug without any error messages about invalid characters.
No user-facing text is introduced or changed to a non-English language as part of this update.

constraints: Keep all existing landing-page content, sections, CTAs, and the advisor hash anchor behavior unchanged.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutable paths.
Any user-facing text related to this change must be in English.
nonGoals: Adding new landing-page sections or changing existing section content.
Changing the existing hash anchor (#arya-vineeth-tata-aig-advisor) behavior or IDs.
Implementing custom DNS, external domain hosting, or third-party deployment integrations.
